trans-unit.source: Contains contextual state information for a designer, such as the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder kontekstavhengig tilstandsinformasjon for en designer som den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This includes permanent state information, such as the list of services running in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter permanent statusinformasjon, for eksempel listen over services kjører i utformeren.

trans-unit.source: It also includes transient state consisting of context items including the set of currently selected objects as well as the editing tool being used to manipulate objects on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder også midlertidig tilstand som består av konteksten elementer inkludert settet med objekter som er merket som redigering verktøyet som brukes til å redigere objekter i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The EditingContext represents the communication boundary that is shared between the hosting application and the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: EditingContext representerer kommunikasjon grensen som er delt mellom verts-programmet og [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/add/includes/wfd1-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The EditingContext was implemented as a concrete class for ease of use.
trans-unit.target: EditingContext ble implementert som en konkret klasse for Enkel bruk.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> to use customized managers derived from <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A>og <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A>bruke egendefinerte lederne av <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager>og <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the context item manager that is returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items*> property.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av konteksten elementet manager som returneres av den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering oppretter en <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>støtter forsinket aktivering av utformingen redigeringsprogrammet ledere via deklarasjon av en <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback>attributtet transportbehandling for utforming redigeringsprogrammet.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager>.</xref:System.Activites.Design.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the service manager to be returned from the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services*> property.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av service manager som skal returneres fra den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services*>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering oppretter en <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager>støtter forsinket aktivering av utformingen redigeringsprogrammet ledere via deklarasjon av en <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback>attributtet transportbehandling for utforming redigeringsprogrammet.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases any unmanaged resources used by the object.
trans-unit.target: Umiddelbart frigir uforvaltede ressurser som brukes av objektet.

trans-unit.source: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by the current <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir umiddelbart uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av gjeldende <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object is being disposed of; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the object is finalizing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet er fjernet av; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis objektet fullfører.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> method is called or when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>-metoden eller når den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"> </xref> objektet er fullført og samlet inn av saneringsoppsamlingen for Microsoft .NET common language runtime.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the local collection of context items stored by the current editing context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den lokale samlingen av konteksten elementer som er lagret av gjeldende redigering kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The Items collection is for data that is shared between a host and the designer.
trans-unit.target: Elementsamlingen er for data som er delt mellom vert og designer.

trans-unit.source: This data provides the mechanism needed to hook into subscription and change notification.
trans-unit.target: Disse dataene inneholder mekanisme kreves for å koble til abonnementet og endringsvarsling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> objects used in this editing context.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager"> </xref> samling <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> objekter som brukes i denne konteksten for redigering.

trans-unit.source: Returns the service manager used in the current editing context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer service manager brukes i gjeldende kontekst for redigering.

trans-unit.source: Services represent functionality that is either provided by the host for the designer to use or that is used by the designer to make functionality available to all designers within the editor.
trans-unit.target: Services representerer funksjonaliteten som tilbys av verten for utformeren for å bruke enten eller som brukes av utformeren til å gjøre funksjonaliteten tilgjengelig for alle utviklere i redigeringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"></xref> used in this editing context.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager"> </xref> brukes i denne konteksten for redigering.
